channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Several large, deep, unavoidable potholes across road, 13th February
item.description:
Several potholes on Manor Road leading towards roundabout for Gallagher retail park, they are unavoidable without going onto other side of the road, and even then they are still widespread and hard to avoid. They have been present for weeks now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hucclecote road, 13th February
item.description:
Fridge freezer has come from one of the flats its been put out of road been there for nearly 2 weeks has blown over twice is a hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Caravan abandoned, 13th February
item.description:
This caravan has been abandoned - it is along a lane used by walkers etc - there is some offensive writing on the back. It looks very intimidating and I am concerned about walking along anywhere near it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Series of pot holes in road., 13th February
item.description:
Multiple pot holes, gets fixed all the time ' badly', how about doing a proper job with the money we pay in taxes! Lots of holes again in road, people swerving to avoid, it will cause an accident!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chosen Way, Hucclecote, Gloucester
